item.description: Update Structure Fire; INC#1650; 11:05PM; 1501 E 17th St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3JnHLQA; Downtown; With over 70 firefighters assigned to the incident, the bulk of the fire was extinguished in 34 minutes with no injuries reported. The fire was in one section of the building and prevented from extending to an adjacent building. There is an exposed gas line which firefighters are allowing to burn (the safest method as it can not be extinguished until leak is secured) while awaiting the gas company. An official ‘knockdown’ not declared but the incident is transitioning out of an active firefight. Firefighters will remain on scene for an extended duration overhaul due to the gas line. Therefore drivers are advised to avoid the area through the night. No further details and no further updates anticipated.; FS 14; Batt 1; Central Bureau; Council District 14; BC1 BC11 BC13 BC5 CM20 CM22 E10 E14 E203 E209 E21 E210 E215 E221 E27 E9 EM1 HR3 RA14 RA3 RA803 RA810 SQ21 T10 T15 T21 T3 T9 UR3 UR88; CH9; 14 15; Margaret Stewart

Structure Fire; INC#1650; 10:31PM; 1501 E 17th St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3JnHLQA; Downtown; One story, commercial building (site of previous burn) with fire through the roof. Firefighters are in the defensive mode. Two additional task forces requested. A; FS 14; Batt 1; Central Bureau; Council District 14; BC1 BC13 E10 E14 E209 E210 SQ21 T10 T9; CH9; 14; Margaret Stewart

Update KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#0721; 12:00PM; 750 E 49th St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3PPSPrN; South Park; KNOCKDOWN: 28 firefighters extinguished the fire in 25 minutes with no injuries reported. The fire was contained to one room. LA Unified School Police notified for their response and security of the structure. Cause and $ loss TBD. No further details.; FS 21; Batt 13; South Bureau; Council District 9; BC1 BC13 E14 E21 E221 E233 E33 SQ21 T21 T33; CH9; 13; Margaret Stewart

Structure Fire; INC#0721; 11:35AM; 750 E 49th St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3PPSPrN; South Park; One story building (part of elementary school) with fire in one room and into the wall. The call was initially received as an automatic fire alarm with multiple activations and was upgraded upon arrival of first LAFD resource. Firefighters are in the offensive mode and made entry into the room. The fire was being held in check by sprinklers. No injuries reported. ; FS 21; Batt 13; South Bureau; Council District 9; BC1 BC13 E14 E21 E221 E233 E33 SQ21 T21 T33; CH9; 13; Margaret Stewart

Structure Fire; INC#0025; 12:40AM; 2646 S Western Bl; MAP: https://bit.ly/3BvagtE; Adams-Normandie; KNOCKDOWN: 46 firefighters extinguished the fire in 19 minutes. With a commercial building only inches away, the quick and aggressive actions of firefighters prevented the blaze from extending and damaging any other structures. There are no injuries reported. Cause and $ loss TBD. No further details.; FS 26; Batt 11; Central Bureau; Council District 8; BC11 BC18 E15 E203 E215 E226 E26 E29 E94 RA34 RA826 SQ21 T15 T26 T3; CH9; 14; Margaret Stewart

Structure Fire; INC#0025; 12:21AM; 2651 S Hobart Bl; MAP: https://bit.ly/3BvagtE; Adams-Normandie; One story, single family dwelling with fire showing and additional buildings exposed on two sides. Firefighters are in the offensive mode.; FS 26; Batt 11; Central Bureau; Council District 8; BC11 BC18 E15 E203 E215 E226 E26 E29 E94 RA34 RA826 SQ21 T15 T26 T3; CH9; 14; Margaret Stewart

Hiker - Hoist Operation; INC#0580; 10:00AM; 8310 La Tuna Canyon Rd; MAP: https://bit.ly/3oInkEa; Shadow Hills; LAFD Aeromedics located the injured 30 year old male mountain biker who is alert and oriented. The patient sustained, what appear to be on initial assessment, non-life threatening injuries. LAFD Air Ops will conduct a hoist operation and transport to the hospital. No further details.; FS 77; Batt 12; Valley Bureau; Council District 7; AO1 BC12 E260 E77 H4 H6 HA4 HA6 RA77 RA874 RH114 T60; CH8; 17; Margaret Stewart

Update KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#0348; 06:57AM; 563 N Heliotrope Dr; MAP: https://bit.ly/3Q8AfLc; East Hollywood; KNOCKDOWN: 26 firefighters extinguished the fire in 20 minutes with no injuries reported. Firefighters remained in the offensive mode as they made entry and extinguished the fire on the 1st floor before making their way up to the 2nd floor and attic. Officers are inspecting the attic of the exposed building to ensure no extension occurred. Crews will remain on scene conducting overhaul operations. No further details.; FS 6; Batt 11; Central Bureau; Council District 13; BC11 E220 E235 E52 E6 RA6 T20 T35; CH9; 13; Margaret Stewart

Structure Fire; INC#0348; 06:37AM; 563 N Heliotrope Dr; MAP: https://bit.ly/3Q8AfLc; East Hollywood; Two story (reportedly vacant) single family dwelling with heavy fire showing. Initial reports of additional structures exposed. Firefighters are in the offensive mode.; FS 6; Batt 11; Central Bureau; Council District 13; BC11 E220 E235 E52 E6 T20 T35; CH9; 13; Margaret Stewart
